abstract: International Monetary Fund head Christine Lagarde says world economy is recovering but fragile and faces 'some downside risks.'
lead_paragraph: The head of the International Monetary Fund, Christine Lagarde, said the world economy was recovering but fragile and faced “some downside risks.”

headline.main: Global Economy Is Recovering but Fragile, Says I.M.F. Chief
headline.print_headline: Global Economy Is Recovering but Fragile, Says I.M.F. Chief

snippet: The head of the International Monetary Fund, Christine Lagarde, said the world economy was recovering but fragile and faced “some downside risks.”
